VideoGames.VideoGameDescription: Set in the fictional world of Azeroth, WoW allows players to create avatar-style characters and explore a sprawling universe while interacting with nonreal players-called nonplayer characters (NPCs)-and other real-world players (PCs).
Wizard101 is a massively multiplayer online role-playing game. In the game, players take on the role of students in order to save their galaxy from multiple threats.
Overwatch 2 is a 2022 first-person shooter. The game intends a shared environment for player-versus-player modes while introducing persistent cooperative modes.
